attributes.action: Step down so that the Conservative Party do not win the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is unpopular, many people will not vote labour for a man who views Britain as a big supermarket and is more concerned with mulcting the electorate for every penny they have than making our lives better.  I also don't want him to be replaced by another front bench career politician (Jack Straw, Harriet Harman, etc) who is more concerned with their annual expenses bill and fattening themselves on the public monies.

If this doesn't happen David Cameron will win the next election.  Do we really want an over-privileged fool and once member of the Bullingdon Club (google it) running the country so he can give handouts to his old school chums?

Please Mr Brown, step down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
